creator: lih@peacetech.com
text:
The internal link rendered below as underlined for "The excerpt from", but 
discontinues for inline text of "Tom Jones":


<fo:block id="tomjones"/>

......

<fo:basic-link text-decoration="underline" color="blue" internal-
destination="tomjones">
  The excerpt from <fo:inline font-style="italic">Tom Jones</fo:inline>
</fo:basic-link>

Thanks for the bug report. The bug is fixed in SVN Trunk now:
http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs?rev=374425&view=rev
creator: jeremias@apache.org

text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
